author: Warhammer
description:
Focus Entertainment and Saber Interactive premiered a new trailer to celebrate the biggest content update to date for their blockbuster third-person action game Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2. The “Obelisk” update is available to all players now and brings a new replayable map for the Operations (PvE) mode, a new Chaos enemy, a huge Dark Angels cosmetic pack for Season Pass owners and a lot more.

Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 is available now on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and PC.

title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 – Obelisk Update Trailer
